name: Spiders Smasher: Mutants bugs
description:
Spiders Smasher offers fun in a simple endless game.
Simply crushes or slice the spiders with your finger, but beware humans.

Thousands of huge mutant spiders are invading your city!
Defend your city and put your finger and your reflexes to the test.
One type Arcade game, exciting, simple and you have to play to relieve stress.

Just you have to touch the bugs and relax! The game does not end.
Ideal for toileting, expect the bus, the dole queue.

Challenge your friends and get the highest score
Crush spiders with your finger in this simple game!

BENEFITS

* Spiders are realistic and quite disgusting!
* Play absolutely FREE!
* Various types of spider to smash
* The Spider Queen is dangerous, she will stain the screen of your device with filthy toxic acids.
* The Best Game for all ages!
* A fun app to pass the time.
* Ideal to spend time, relax and belly.
* Full 3D game with little weight.

All free!

Prevents mutant spiders invade your city, Flatten!
